content:
Field                                Description                                   How_to_get
0                     product_id                          Unique identifier               Generate UUID during ingestion
1                     brand_name                                 Brand name              Scrape INCIDecoder/retailer PDP
2                   product_name                          Full product name              Scrape INCIDecoder/retailer PDP
3                    description                  Short product description                   Scrape PDP; clean with LLM
4                  category_step         Routine step (cleanser/serum/etc.)      Keyword map or LLM on title/description
5                   is_face_only                    Face-only vs multi-area                     PDP description keywords
6              primary_image_url                      Primary product image                         Scrape PDP image/CDN
7                product_pdp_url                    Product detail page URL                                 Scrape/crawl
8                         status           Active/discontinued/reformulated            INCIDecoder status; brand updates
9                      inci_full                            Raw INCI string                                  INCIDecoder
10                   inci_parsed              Array of ingredients in order                         Parse INCI; tokenise
11                  lead_actives                                Key actives               LLM/regex on INCI + PDP claims
12         active_strength_known                     Actives % if published            Brand/PDP; leave blank if unknown
13             is_fragrance_free                        Fragrance-free flag                 Detect parfum/EU26 allergens
14       contains_essential_oils                     Essential oils present                      Detect EO names in INCI
15        contains_alcohol_denat                      Alcohol denat present                           Search INCI tokens
16         fungal_acne_safe_flag                  Malassezia-safe heuristic             Deny-list of esters/polysorbates
17        comedogenic_risk_score                    0–3 comedogenicity risk  Heuristic rules by top-10 INCI oils/butters
18         irritation_risk_score                        0–3 irritation risk          Fragrance/EO/alcohol/strong actives
19           pregnancy_safe_flag                          Safe in pregnancy        Deny-list: retinoids, HQ, SA>2%, etc.
20               skin_type_flags       Oily/dry/combo/sensitive suitability                Rule-based from actives + PDP
21             concern_fit_flags  Acne/PIH/redness/barrier/texture/anti-age                   Actives-to-concern mapping
22               vehicle_texture             Gel/cream/lotion/oil/balm/etc.                         PDP + INCI heuristic
23                        finish               Matte/dewy/natural/occlusive                        LLM/reviews/PDP hints
24                         color                 Tint or colour if relevant                               PDP or reviews
25                     spf_value                                 SPF number                                PDP/packaging
26                      spf_type                    Mineral/chemical/hybrid                      From UV filters in INCI
27                 uva_ppd_or_pa                                  PA or PPD                   PDP/packaging if available
28                     pa_rating                          PA+/PA+++/unknown                                PDP/packaging
29           broad_spectrum_flag                       Broad spectrum claim                                PDP/packaging
30        is_water_resistant_spf                     Water resistance claim                                PDP/packaging
31       uvisafe_claims_verified                 Verification for UV claims                 Manual/reliable sources only
32            instructions_basic                      Basic usage direction                               PDP; summarise
33                  routine_time                                 AM/PM/both              Infer from actives (retinol=PM)
34              step_order_index                           Index in routine                              Map by category
35                  country_code              Retailer country for this row                        From retailer context
36                 retailer_name                             Retailer label                                  Scrape site
37                  retailer_url                               Where to buy                              Scrape PDP link
38                      currency                              Currency code                                 Retailer/PDP
39                  price_retail                               Retail price                                   Scrape PDP
40                       size_ml                               Size in ml/g                PDP; parse variants if needed
41                price_per_10ml                    Computed price per 10ml                      Compute (price/size*10)
42           availability_status                             In stock / OOS                       PDP scrape if feasible
43              last_checked_utc                     Timestamp last checked                            Populate on crawl
44             affiliate_program                   amazon/skimlinks/rs/none                       Your affiliate mapping
45             affiliate_link_id                    Affiliate link token/id                         Your network mapping
46                   rating_mean                             Avg rating 0–5                  Retailer reviews API/scrape
47                      rating_n                               Review count                  Retailer reviews API/scrape
48      review_sentiment_overall                           −1..+1 sentiment                         LLM/NLP over reviews
49   review_sentiment_by_persona             JSON by skin type/tone/concern               NLP grouping if tags available
50      irritation_mentions_rate              % reviews flagging irritation                               NLP on reviews
51         texture_mentions_json                 JSON freq of texture terms                               NLP on reviews
52                   topics_json            Key topics/complaints/positives                               NLP on reviews
53                packaging_type                Tube/jar/pump/dropper/stick                        PDP image/description
54                    pao_months                       Period After Opening                                PDP/packaging
55                   launch_date                            Original launch                               Brand comms/PR
56            reformulation_date                          Reformulated date                            Brand/INCIDecoder
57                  cruelty_free                          Cruelty-free flag                    Brand policy / aggregator
58                         vegan                                 Vegan flag                     Brand or retailer filter
59              regulatory_notes                          EU allergens etc.                          PDP/regulatory docs
60                      ph_range                           Product pH range                     Brand claims / lab tests
61             occlusivity_index                   0–3 occlusive heuristics       Heuristic from INCI (waxes/petrolatum)
62               viscosity_class                     Low/med/high viscosity                  Heuristic from vehicle/INCI
63             colorants_present                         Colorants included                           CI numbers in INCI
64           preservatives_class      Parabens/phenoxyethanol/organic acids                                   INCI parse
65     photo_sensitizers_present                Citrus oils/AHA combos etc.                                 INCI + rules
66  ingredient_percent_estimates           Model-estimated % of key actives                   LLM/model if not disclosed
67       malassezia_trigger_list          List of risky esters/polysorbates                            Derived from INCI
68                 peptide_types                Signal/carrier/neuro/copper                             INCI parse + LLM
69             antioxidant_stack      VitC type, ferulic, EGCG, resveratrol                                   INCI parse
70           retinoid_generation              Retinol/retinal/granactive/Rx                             INCI parse + PDP
71                   AHA_profile      Glycolic/lactic/mandelic, free acid %                         PDP/INCI + estimates
72    compatibility_ruleset_hash                    Hash of product’s rules                    Compute from INCI/vehicle
73       clinical_evidence_score                      0–1 evidence strength             Map from internal evidence table
74          country_availability                List of ISO codes available                 Aggregate retailer countries
75              effect_embedding                 Vector for effect matching                 Compute with embedding model
76                inci_embedding                      Vector of INCI tokens                 Compute with embedding model

data.How_to_get: Keyword map or LLM on title/description

full_data.How_to_get: Keyword map or LLM on title/description
Heuristic rules by top-10 INCI oils/butters
